content.rendered:
NMIMS is one of the top B- Schools in India that offers distance learning MBA programmes. It aims at imparting quality education and training to its students so that they can excel in different fields.

It is awarded the prestigious NIRF-25 rank in management courses with NAAC (grade ‘A+’) and UGC-DEB clearance.

It offers around 10 specialisations to the aspirants to help them ace their domains in the real business world. NMIMS provides students with advanced learning modules, flexible study schedules, the latest learning systems equipped with modern technology, video lectures & e-books designed by highly qualified faculty members, mentorship, career assistance services etc.

The university has entered into collaboration with some elite corporations, thus bringing the best opportunities to students. However, what sets the course apart is the fact that you can pursue the course while working as the university offers a flexible study and examination schedule. Furthermore, you are not required to attempt any entrance exam for enrollment. Thus, you can earn a superlative MBA degree from one of the most renowned universities in the nation without any hassle.

NMIMS Distance Education Highlights

NMIMS Distance Education MBA Admission 2023

The MBA program at NMIMS has been developed in such a way that the student can have fun while studying the material and meets industry standards. MBA is a master’s degree program at the professional level that covers all of the topics that are relevant in everyday life. Students must graduate from an accredited university with a bachelor’s degree in any subject. A minimum of 50% in prior academics is required of candidates.

Admission Procedure:

Step 1: Registration

Fill out the online Registration Form and pay the Admission Processing Fee.

Step 2: Document Submission

You’re required to submit the following documents to the Authorised Enrolment Partner.

  • Academic Documents
  • Photographic Identification (Govt. approved)
  • Passport Size Photographs
  • Documents for Work Experience (if any)

The papers will be verified by the counselor at the Authorised Enrolment Partner and then uploaded to the system.

*At the time of admission, enrolling students must bring authentic documentation.

Step 3: Payment of Fees

Payment Options: 

  • Bank Demand Draft payable to ‘SVKM’s NMIMS’ in Mumbai.
  • Online payment using credit cards.

Step 4: Confirmation

When the University approves the supplied papers and fees, your admission will be verified, and you will be given a student number.

(On confirmation of acceptance, Study Kits, Student Portal Activation, and Lectures are available.)

NMIMS Last Date To Apply

New Admission Schedule for 2023

Eligibility Criteria

  • The candidate must have a bachelor’s degree with an aggregate of 50% marks from an institution recognised by the Association of Indian Universities, in any discipline.

Fee Structure

Students can select between lecture delivery programmes:

Pro: Students can attend live-interactive courses as well as recorded lectures. 

Prime: Students can watch recorded lectures using the Prime delivery method. 

Prime+: The Prime+ mode allows students to select which live-interactive lectures they want to attend. Note: Contact a student counselor for a more complete explanation of the pricing structure.

The above article includes all the information about the admission process, fees, registration for enrolment, last date to apply etc. in case of any concern or doubt visit our authorized enrolment partner website.

Career Opportunities After Distance MBA Programme

Distance MBA offers ample career opportunities to its students. Some of them are listed below:

Source: Glassdoor

Takeaway:

Distance MBA courses from NMIMS cater to the needs of various students and working professionals to work at par in their respective careers. It delivers the required set of skills to the aspirants to make them an asset to the organisation. Thus, a Master’s degree from NMIMS will have a great impact on your career and help you achieve milestones in your journey. The admissions for 2023 have already started, apply before last date to avoid any late fee penalties.

To Know more visit: NMIMS Distance MBA or call us at +91 87002 83898.
